9_12i4LiZ39NxcYtsf36aTWJzcpzw4KFUCJy.body: I must attribute the observation to Tom Woods (http://tomwoods.com/podcasts/) but he nailed it: Whatever else you think about Trump, you have to LOVE the fact that he rather completely (and probably permanently) ended the political career of Jeb Bush. This I LOVE.
